publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2432 Brian Adam: Cairnfield Place/Auchmill Road Junction—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to install traffic lights with a pedestrian phase on the Cairnfield Place/Auchmill Road junction in light of the Scottish Executive Reporter’s perverse decision to allow the construction of 43 flats on Cairnfield Place, Bucksburn. Supported by: Shiona Baird*, Richard Lochhead*
S2M-2432 Cairnfield Place/Auchmill Road Junction (lodged on 15 February 2005) Michael Matheson*
S2M-2432 Cairnfield Place/Auchmill Road Junction (lodged on 15 February 2005) Mr David Davidson*
S2M-2432 Cairnfield Place/Auchmill Road Junction (lodged on 15 February 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-2432 Cairnfield Place/Auchmill Road Junction (lodged on 15 February 2005) Ms Sandra White*
